alert.note: Alert for Huerfano; Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 12:28PM MDT until June 13 at 1:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Huerfano County in southeastern Colorado... North central Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 100 PM MDT. * At 1228 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles northeast of Aguilar, or 28 miles north of Trinidad, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Huerfano and north central Las Animas Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
